title: WTT: T206 Crawford AB 350 for CYCle 460
author: Sterling Sports Auctions

posts.post_title: WTT: T206 Crawford AB 350 for CYCle 460
posts.post_content:
I have a T206 Crawford batting SGC 40 with a AB 350 no Frame that I would like to trade for the same card with a Cycle 460 back to add to my subset.  I have no interest in moving the card unless the Cycle 460 is involved.

I hope there is someone out there that can help me, I am down to 23 cards, with only 3 HOFers left and would love to knock this one off the list.


Thanks

Lee
